data.query: { repository(owner: "designsystemau", name: "blog-site") {        name        codeOfConduct {          body        }        issues(first: 20) {          totalCount          nodes {            id            url            number            lastEditedAt            createdAt            title            bodyHTML            participants(first: 20) {              totalCount              nodes {                id                url                name                avatarUrl              }            }            comments(first: 1) {              totalCount              nodes {                id                url                lastEditedAt                createdAt                bodyHTML                author {                  url                  avatarUrl                  login                }              }            }          }        }        pullRequests(first: 20) {          totalCount          nodes {            id            permalink            title            participants(first: 20) {              totalCount              nodes {                id                url                name                avatarUrl              }            }            comments(first: 1) {              totalCount              nodes {                id                url                lastEditedAt                createdAt                bodyHTML                author {                  url                  avatarUrl                  login                }              }            }          }        }      }    }
